::Axis/Lokk::

Lokk disarms his weapons, and cuts in before Axis can ruin 
everything. "I'm Lokk, this is Seekker," he points to Seekker, "and 
this is Axis," he indicates Axis. Axis waves. "We just crashed over 
there." He gestures in a southernly direction. "Our short range 
scanner was the only thing that survived the crash, besides us. We 
used it and found that there was large amounts of energon being 
emmited in this area, enough energon to suggest a small battle or 
something. So, we came over to see if we could help somebody in 
need if we deemed their cause worthy." he stopped talking and 
waited for a reply, his metallic blue body gleaming in the snow and 
light. Axis stands tall behind him.
